item.description:
who would like to go out for some food to eat?
this place offersseasonal outside dining, seasonal live entertainment, extensive wine and beer menu, outside bar over looking the court yard, great view of 15 tvs. the stone forge embraces an colonial tavern concept featuring an warm and friendly atmosphere. enjoy the view of our open kitchen, from where you can watch your food ger perpared.
this is an joint event so if you are with wings or the 30+singles group only rsvp with one group please
hope to see everyone there
item.how_to_find_us: eric is hosting: 781-254-1289 call my cell

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: the stone forge tavern
